job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtWe are looking for a hardworking innovative and goal driven Senior Software Engineer to join our Enterprise Information Management team for a new HTML ampamp Angular project The ideal candidate will have excellent frontend and Angular development skills including developing new user interfaces from scratch Candidates should possess complementary skills on the backend API and database layersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtRemote candidates are acceptable with a preference for local candidates in the Las Vegas or Henderson NV arealtpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtResponsibilitiesltpgtltpgt	Develop quality Enterprise Information Management software utilizing Microsoft software development languages and toolsltpgtltpgt	Create software designs for enhancements or features based on best practicesltpgtltpgt	Participates in code and design reviews Makes updates based on review recommendationsltpgtltpgt	Keeps current on latest Microsoft development productsltpgtltpgt	Provide support and maintenance on existing applications with the assistance of more experienced engineers as neededltpgtltpgt	Documents and demonstrates solutions by developing documentation flowcharts layouts diagrams charts code comments and clear code with the assistance of more experienced engineers as neededltpgtltpgt	Demonstrate code quality through proper unit and other testingltpgtltpgt	Break down user stories into component tasks and provide estimates with the assistance of more experienced engineers as neededltpgtltpgt	Work in a collaborative development environment with a team of developersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe above statements are intended only to describe the general nature of the job and should not be construed as an allinclusive list of position responsibilitiesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtRequirementsltpgtltpgt	Previous Software Engineering experience 6
